== Global Jam in Portland, OR, December 2013 ==

Information useful for those attending the Ubuntu Global Jam at Free Geek in Portland, OR on March 3, 2013

=== Venue ===
<pre>
  Free Geek
  1731 SE 10th Avenue
  Portland, OR 97214
Find Sign on Door!
</pre>
The event will run from 1pm to 5:30pm on Sunday, March 3.

=== Useful links ===
A series of links to resources that may be helpful to those participating
* <nowiki>[[http://developer.ubuntu.com/packaging/html/getting-set-up.html|Getting Setup]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://harvest.ubuntu.com/| Find low hanging opportunities using Ubuntu Harvest]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://developer.ubuntu.com/packaging/html/index.html| Ubuntu Packaging Guide]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Bugs/HowToTriage/|Ubuntu Bug Triage Guide]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MOTU/TODO|Ubuntu MOTU TODO]]</nowiki>

=== IRC ===
IRC channels are available to use for coordination during the event at
## ubuntu-us-or on irc.ubuntu.com

=== Targets ===
* Please feel free to work on bugs that are within your experience level and if you need help ask and someone might be able to help you but we do not want to impede their work flow either so please be sure to be familar with some of the tasks and work flow of bug fixing :)
